fields.title: Fantasy
fields.description: Stories set in imaginary worlds with magic and mythical creatures.

fields.title: Science Fiction
fields.description: Explores futuristic concepts like space, AI, and time travel.

fields.title: Mystery
fields.description: Stories involving crime-solving, suspense, or detective work.

fields.title: Horror
fields.description: Designed to evoke fear, dread, or unease.

fields.title: Historical Fiction
fields.description: Set in the past with real historical events and figures.

fields.title: Slice of Life
fields.description: Focuses on everyday experiences and realistic characters.

fields.title: LitRPG
fields.description: Blends literature and role-playing games with stats and leveling.

fields.title: Dystopian
fields.description: Set in a bleak or ruined future with societal collapse.

fields.title: Isekai
fields.description: Protagonists are transported to another world.
